contents.text: Powercord will now bake better toasts, with pre-applied butter or whatever you like to put on them.
list: **100% more cute**, because Harley did a good job.
**They are now part of the public plugin API** meaning you can make use of them in your plugins. Isn't that nice?
**Announcements are also part of the public API**, so if you want to send them you can!

contents.text: Just wanted a second red category, because red is a cool color.

list: **Updater got some tweaking** to help it not explode while updating. I thought it's be cool.
**Removed a spoiler** because spoilers are bad. I'm sure no one noticed it was here. And if you did, you saw nothing ok?
**Added a spoiler** because spoilers are cool. I'm sure you'll like it. It's about a wanted feature. That is cool.
**First install banner**'s "Join Server" button will now **open an invite prompt first**, instead of immediately dropping you into the server.

**Documentation is coming soon**, and most of the work client-side is done :zoomeyes:. We just need to write them now... Seeya in a few years! <3 After all, what is 10 years on the scale of the universe? Nothing right?
**Custom Route API** is here, which lets plugins register new React routes for more complex UIs. It is still experimental and subject to breaking changes.
**Backend API v2 is being worked on**, which will ship a lot of features that'll be then used in Powercord (like plugin installer OwO whats this).
Various tweaking and fixing to make Powercord overall more stable.
